ci_support_linux_64_r_base4.4.yaml:
cdt_name:
- conda
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
cran_mirror:
- https://cran.r-project.org
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
pin_run_as_build:
  r-base:
    min_pin: x.x
    max_pin: x.x
r_base:
- '4.4'
target_platform:
- linux-64

about.summary: Implements a custom matrix input field.
Implements a custom matrix input field.

name: r-shinymatrix
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = "0.8.0" %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-shinymatrix
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/shinyMatrix_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/shinyMatrix/shinyMatrix_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: fc9dd16128b783cb2e09e24703fe76dcf0f3d7f76da07c04573b11d7038c9536

build:
  number: 2
  noarch: generic
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]
    - cross-r-base {{ r_base }}    # [build_platform != target_platform]
  host:
    - r-base
    - r-jsonlite
    - r-shiny
  run:
    - r-base
    - r-jsonlite
    - r-shiny

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('shinyMatrix')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('shinyMatrix')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://CRAN.R-project.org/package=shinyMatrix
  license: MIT
  summary: Implements a custom matrix input field.
  license_family: MIT
  license_file:
    - '{{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/MIT'
    - LICENSE

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r

# Package: shinyMatrix
# Title: Shiny Matrix Input Field
# Version: 0.6.0
# Author: Andreas Neudecker
# Maintainer: Andreas Neudecker <andreas.neudecker@inwt-statistics.de>
# Description: Implements a custom matrix input field.
# Depends: R (>= 3.5)
# License: MIT + file LICENSE
# Encoding: UTF-8
# Imports: shiny, jsonlite
# Suggests: testthat, covr
# RoxygenNote: 7.1.0
# NeedsCompilation: no
# Packaged: 2021-05-20 15:50:59 UTC; laneudecker
# Repository: CRAN
# Date/Publication: 2021-05-20 16:40:02 UTC
